name: Super Chloro Adventure
description:
Controls

Mouse left - Hold Chloro/Other objects/Interact/Guide

Mouse Right - Pet Chloro

Story

You have found strange cartridge for old 16-bit console. It appears to be some sort of platformer, but you can't do anything with standart controller, it supports very rare Console Mouse accessory to interact with cute main character and guide it.

Credits

Programms used - Petaporon, Chiptone, Construct 2, Paint.net

External Assets - Character Base and Cursor (Was heavily edited) 

Other - TextCraft (logo maker)
